Html:
Hello,

I've a PHP Script that allow you to load a '.xlsx' file to MySQL and once it has been loaded, you can search content [HTML Form] writting ID + Name [Only if both match].

I'm newbie and i did my best, but i wonder if you could help me because i don't get it load content from Multiple Sheets, it load the content from first sheet only.

Here is the Script [jSON] [If you can take a look].
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B32gqAIU2ueRMUFOcjhaNUJsd2M/

It contains Config.php [MySQL], Search.php [Once file has been loaded] and admin/index.php [Form to load file to MySQL], also Query txt to create 'prefix' in MySQL DB and index.html where you can search the content.

Thank you,
Regards
